market.name: FlutterSale - E-commerce UI Kit
market.description: Premium Flutter UI kit for e-commerce applications. Build beautiful shopping apps for iOS and Android with 50+ pre-built screens, cart functionality, product listings, and checkout flows. Production-ready Flutter templates that save months of development time. Perfect for grocery stores, retail, and online marketplace apps.

market.name: Hotel Booking - Flutter UI Kit
market.description: Professional Flutter UI kit for hotel booking applications. Includes 40+ screens for hotel search, room selection, booking management, and user profiles. Ready-made Flutter components for iOS and Android that accelerate hospitality app development. Features include maps integration, date pickers, and payment flows.

market.name: SportUp - Sport & Fitness Flutter UI Kit
market.description: Modern Flutter UI kit designed for sports and fitness applications. Build engaging workout tracking, sports news, and fitness community apps for iOS and Android. Includes 45+ screens with activity tracking, social features, and statistics dashboards. Premium Flutter templates for the sports industry.

market.name: Taxi Booking - Passenger Flutter UI Kit
market.description: Complete Flutter UI kit for taxi and ride-sharing applications. Build Uber-like apps for iOS and Android with 50+ screens including real-time tracking, fare calculation, driver matching, and payment integration. Production-ready Flutter components that reduce development time by 70%.

market.name: Crypto Wallet
market.description: The Crypto Wallet App UI Concept is built with Flutter and dynamic animations for an engaging user experience. It features smooth transitions and interactive elements for managing digital assets. The intuitive design makes cryptocurrency management easy and visually appealing.

market.name: Onboarding Screen
market.description: The Onboarding Screen for the cooking app, built with Flutter, introduces users to the app's core features with smooth animations. It guides users through key functions like browsing recipes, saving favorites, and creating shopping lists. The simple, engaging design ensures a seamless and enjoyable setup experience for new users.

market.name: Movie App
market.description: The Movie App is built using Riverpod for state management, Dio for API integration, and Freezed for immutable data modeling. It fetches movie data from TheMovieDB API, providing users with a seamless experience to browse movie details, watch trailers, and explore ratings. The app offers smooth navigation and real-time updates, ensuring an engaging and dynamic movie discovery experience.

market.name: School App
market.description: The School App UI Concept is designed to help students manage assignments and tasks efficiently. The app features an intuitive interface for tracking deadlines, submitting assignments, and viewing grades. With a clean layout and easy navigation, it ensures students stay organized and on top of their academic responsibilities.

market.name: Spotify Clone
market.description: The Apotify UI Concept is a sleek and modern music streaming app design that offers an intuitive user interface. It features seamless navigation for discovering playlists, albums, and artists, along with easy controls for music playback. The design emphasizes a smooth, engaging experience with vibrant visuals and dynamic transitions.

market.name: Restaurant App
market.description: The Restaurant Food App offers a user-friendly interface for browsing menus, placing orders, and discovering new dishes. With intuitive navigation, users can easily customize their orders, view restaurant details, and track delivery. The app is designed to provide a seamless and enjoyable food ordering experience.
